_sText: Update @ Jan 16, 2009, On request, an alternate skin has been made and uploaded here. This is just a quick easy way of re-skinning which omits some of the decals/detail. Therefore, this skin is not added as a third skin in the skin family of the model. To use this skin, download the file from above link and REPLACE the original files. ------------------------- Model is divided into 3 sub-parts: MAIN, WINDOWS and SEATS. MAIN and WINDOWS are considered the base model, they both need to be present to make the model work properly(Due to the complexity of Vphysics, collision meshes(aka physbox) are distributed evenly into both MAIN and WINDOWS, so, again, these two sub-parts are the basis). Another sub-part, SEATS, is optional, the absence of SEATS will also lead to the unavailability of its own physbox. For more detail, open up HLMV and see how these 3 sub-parts and its collision meshes work together seamlessly. All 3 sub-parts are having the same origin, mapper is supposed to align them on the same coordinates. To align sub-parts, simply use paste special function to line up all models onto exact same coordiante. For some reason, the vphysics(collision mesh) is messed up when you roatate the model at any random angle, try your best to lay all parts of this model perpendicularly,ie. facing either 3, 6, 9 or 12 o'clock. There are 3 sub-parts of the models: volvo_b9tlw_main.mdl volvo_b9tlw_windows.mdl volvo_b9tlw_seats.mdl In total, all models will have a 6 different combinations.(see screenshots, 2 x 1 x 3 = 6). There are 2 skins for the main model (skin number 0 or 1); there is only 1 skin for window model; there are 2 skins for seats model(skin 0 or 1) providing that seats model can be absent as well. Mr. Kit 2008 Oct 28 _________________________ All models are stated "$staticprop" in qc files for compiling, further prop type can be made if requested. All models are provided with proper physics box( or collision model, or vphysics, so manny names lol). Players are actually be able to walk into the bus go up/downstair, jump onto a seat, walk along the hallway and camp. LODs are provided to avoid lag No animation involved No bump/normal map involved Part of the textures have specular map and alpha map(used for transparency or lumination) polycount of models: main: 8660 (LOD @ 140: 4210) windows: 252 (LOD @ 140: 132) seats: 3002 (LOD @ 140: 896) Textures size are about 8MB Software used: PS CS3, Lightwave 9.5 Installation Instructions: Straight forward, simply extract the rar/zip file into cstrike folder, so that the paths: x:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\USER\counter-strike source\cstrike\models\models_kit x:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\USER\counter-strike source\cstrike\materials\models\models_kit are both containing the files and valid directories Please respect the right that i made these models. You are allowed to change the texture image, but my name "Mr. Kit" MUST be credited, either tagged onto texture image, written into a readme file or written as the map's credit. You are also welcome to distribute these models, also feel free to use them on your custom map. You are suposed to give me, Mr. Kit, credit while publlishing your map. Please contact me when you release your map to public, so that i can see how good/bad the models react ingame. To see more of my models pack, please click on my name "mrkit4423" and click submission. My email address are kwbingo@yahoo.com.hk or kwbingojp@yahoo.co.jp
